Text:
I am having same problem!
When you use the key generator and generate a key it says"Congratulations! YOu have successfully activated Macro Expert. From this point on, you have become a legal user of Macro Expert! "
But if you close Macro Expert It then restart you get
"Macro Expert has been expired, please enter your license code to activate it, if you dont have a license code, please click the below link to purchase"  0 days left, but you can enter the same license code again and it starts working again!  
The loop starts again!!
